title: enna tAn kOpam svAmikku
sahitya:
enna tAn kOpam en svAmikku en mElE innam varak-kANEnE


anupallavi

  minnEr vizhi maDa annamE kELAi vEDikkai kurumbellAm pOdAdO innam nALAi 
kal nenjam tAnO svAmiyai kELAi kaNNapurattArkku eNNam yAr mElAi
			(madhyamakAla)
kAr maNanda kuvaLait-taNmalar mEniyum kaLirum maNanda naDaiyazhagum 
azhagoDu paNmaNanda kuzhalE...ndu koNDadu karamum viralum ArmaNanda 
ariyAda vizhiyum koNDadu avar kuTramalladu en kuTramO shollaDi


caraNam    aDangAda kanrOTTi avarukku pazhakkam avarai aDakka enrAl ArAlE naDakkum iDam kETTu 
bali munnE EmATriya pazhakkam ennAccADi ippO kauravan munnO naDakkum kaDanda nAL 
eNNip-pArkka kanjan tanda nOkkum kALiyan mElE aLandAl tAnA naDakkum kAr maNanda shollaDi
